subject: Football
lead_paragraph: After starting 297 N.F.L. games in a row, a sprained right shoulder forced the Vikings quarterback to miss Monday night’s game against the Giants. Tarvaris Jackson started for Minnesota.
snippet: After starting 297 N.F.L. games in a row, a sprained right shoulder forced the Vikings quarterback to miss Monday night’s game against the Giants. Tarvaris Jackson started for Minnesota.
